channel.title: Make items lose on death, 508

item.title: Make items lose on death, 508
item.dc:creator: @EpidemicScape525 EpidemicScape525
item.description:
@EpidemicScape525 wrote:

i was wondering how i could make items lose on death. on my server when you die you keep all items. Eve if npc kills you, you keep all items. i dunno if this helps but here are some codes. waitDeathDelay = -1; randomVariable = false; poisonHitCount = 0; isPoisoned = false; poisonDelay = 0; resetPrayer(); freezeDelay = 0; frames.sendMessage(this, "My kill message..."); specAmount = 1000; combatWith = 0;

Read full topic
